rows.label: qev025603_MSG0001
rows.name: All right, why did this Ma-non drag me out here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0002
rows.name:
Look, I'm in the middle of work, so if you need
something, make it quick.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0003
rows.name:
*sniff* Poor Bobby...
He died at Devil's Colony over in Oblivia...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0004
rows.name:
So if his watch hasn't rusted away already,
it'll be lying out there someplace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0005
rows.name:
But why are you going to all this trouble for me?
Who ARE you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0006
rows.name:
Oof... I'd been holding it all in and trying to just focus
on work, but now you've gone and made me think
about him again...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0007
rows.name:
I remember one night, he... I was washing dishes,
and he said running a restaurant must be tough.
Then he gave me some hand cream, just because.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0008
rows.name:
My shop sees BLADEs every day, but... *sniff*
Nobody cared like Bobby.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0009
rows.name:
I've gathered sufficient data on sorrow, I think?
Please recover this wristwatch and restore her
brain-waves to to to baseline levels, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0010
rows.name: That... That's Bobby's watch![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0011
rows.name:
Oh, thank you... I actually gave this to him, you know?
It was to commemorate his first combat deployment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0012
rows.name: Holding it now feels... Well, it's like he's here with me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0013
rows.name:
Oh! Her numbers are stabilizing before our eyes!
It seems that watches not only tell time, but also
serve to neutralize human sorrow? Fascinating...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_JNK0010
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: qev025603_SEL0011
rows.name: Explain Pauline's reaction.

rows.label: qev025603_JNK0020
rows.name: Ignore

rows.label: qev025603_SEL0021
rows.name: Let Chiopitus draw his own conclusions.

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Mourning process? Emotional closure?
Is this some secret code, perhaps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0015
rows.name:
Regardless, I've gathered excellent data, haven't I?
Once analysis is complete, I'll hopefully have a full
grasp of your human sorrow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0016
rows.name:
The next time I meet a human in a state of sorrow,
I will know to present them with a wristwatch, won't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0017
rows.name: I can't wait for for for further test data on the matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0018
rows.name: Oh... Aah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0019
rows.name:
Ack! Her emotional state had stabilized, hadn't it?
Now it's leaping off the charts![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0020
rows.name:
On the back of the watch, it says "Mother Pauline,
protect me." Bobby must have written that...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0021
rows.name:
That damn fool. Thinking of me as a mother?
Of all the hopeless, lovable...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0022
rows.name:
Hmm... Her brain-waves oscillation is now different
from her previous state, isn't it? It seems that sorrow
is quite the complex emotion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0023
rows.name:
...No matter. Let us hurry on to the next sample, okay?
Please return to our previous location.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0024
rows.name:
I'll take good care of this watch until he comes home
from the Lifehold Core. Then I'll give it back to him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0025
rows.name:
Thank you so much. And please tell your funny little
Ma-non friend thanks as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0026
rows.name:
Lifehold units are being destroyed one after the next.
You don't think the Lifehold Core is... I mean, it's safe,
right? Isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0027
rows.name:
If not, I guess it'd be a lot quieter in the restaurant.
All these happy, chatty folks would just...drop dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025603_MSG0028
rows.name:
...No. I don't even want to think about that happening.
Please, you have to find it![ST:wait ]
